sentences.sContent: Pompeii was destroyed when the volcano erupted in 79 AD.
sentences.sCn: 庞贝城于公元79年在火山爆发中毁灭。

phrases.pCn: 休眠火山；睡火山，休火山

remMethod.val: vol(=will意志力) + can(会) + (n)o → 火山爆发不以人的意志为转移 → 火山

words.tran: 火山的；猛烈的；易突然发作的

trans.tranOther: a mountain with a large hole at the top, through which lava(= very hot liquid rock ) is sometimes forced out
